      void print(java.lang.String text)
      Simple print method, allowing classes to input a built string Normal escape sequences accepted Can be for proper nouns, which won't get translated

        public void printLook(Room currentRoom)
        Print a sequence of print literal strings
        Parameters:

      • printItems

        public void printItems(Room currentRoom)
        Print the room's items. From an string array, where first element is the description of the item and the second is the item's weight
        Parameters:
        currentRoom - the room the player is in

      • printPlayers

        public void printPlayers(Room currentRoom)
        Get and print the names and items for all players in the room Development: need to get the array list of the player items from the Player class
        Parameters:
        currentRoom - the room the player is in

      • printHelp

        public void printHelp()
        Print out some help information. Here we print some stupid, cryptic message and a list of the command words.

      • getInput

        public java.lang.String getInput()
        Show the user interface and get the input
        Returns:
        the user's input as a string

      • printErr

        public void printErr(java.lang.String err)
        Print out relevant error messages
        Parameters:

        public void println(java.lang.String text)
        Prints a line of keys after converting to its value
        Parameters:
        text - the input text as a string

      • print

        public void print(java.lang.String text)
        Simple print method, allowing classes to input a built string Normal escape sequences accepted Can be for proper nouns, which won't get translated
        Parameters:
        text - the input text as a string
